rooms.description: Vastu compliant entrance with a water element near the entrance to welcome positive energy.
Open-plan living space merging seamlessly with the kitchen. Exposed concrete walls and floor slab accentuate Brutalist aesthetics while allowing ample natural light.
Fully integrated open-plan kitchen featuring raw finishes and minimalistic fixtures to complement the brutalist theme.
A spacious studio bedroom with a mezzanine design option. Features natural light and ventilation in line with Vastu principles.
Functional bathroom integrated within the studio apartment, ensuring privacy while adhering to Vastu guidelines for water-related spaces.
Indoor/outdoor pool area designed as a focal point with raw concrete finishes and minimalistic landscaping. The placement is chosen per Vastu norms to balance energy flows.

openings.description: Large, imposing door crafted in exposed reinforced concrete following Brutalist style.
Large windows strategically placed to maximize natural light and adhere to Vastu guidelines for energy flow.
Exterior balcony providing an outdoor space with a view of the swimming pool area, ensuring positive energy circulation.
